inn1.comm: flatter and floated up to the bat, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
allows the ball to come in and nudges it behind square on the leg side for a quick couple
full and flighted, KJP pushes it  back to the bowler
similar ball, it's pushed back to the bowler again
flatter and fuller again, the batsman keeps defending it down the pitch
it's a good over as the bowler repeats the length and KJP again pushes it down the pitch
starts off with a length delivery outside off and Thirimanne allows it to go through
this one surprises the batsman with the extra bounce! Jags in towards the ribs too, Lahiru takes his one hand off the bat as he defends it towards the leg side
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to cover
nice length from Shapoor, he teases the batsman with one outside off, but Lahiru allows this to patiently go through
back of length again, this one is closer to the off stump. Thirimanne gets right behind the line and defends
another good over for Aghanistan! Shapoor keeps it tight around the off stump and all Thirimanne can do is defend it to off
he steps out of the crease and calmly pushes it down the ground to long on for a single
full and flighted, the batsman wanted to drive it through cover, but it's too full and he has to jam it out
tries to cut it through off, but it takes the underedge and lobs over the stumps.. Lucky escape
stays in the crease and defends it towards the leg side
comes forward and drives it to wide mid-off to get off the mark
he stays on target, the batsman comes forward and defends
waits on the back foot and punches it to wide mid-off to pick up a single

some width and some swing for Shapoor too! KJP throws his bat at that one, but only pushes it to extra cover off the toe end. He calls for a quick single though and would have been a gonner if it was a direct hit
comes forward and whips the length delivery past square leg for a single
he keeps it in the channel outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it back to the bowler
oh nice delivery! This one is a touch fuller and catches the batsman on the back foot. Kusal ends up pushing it to mid on
he comes forward and punches the length delivery straight to extra cover
oh that was almost a wicket! Thirimanne tries to blast this full delivery out of the ground, but only gets a toe-end.. There was a fielder at long on and it falls short of him
fuller and quicker, the batsman comes forward and defends
quicker and sliding down the leg side, KJP attempts the sweep but gets hit on the pads
the batsman comes forward to defend this down the pitch
and KJP earns the first boundary of the innings! This was flatter and shorter outside off, but kJP waits and flat-bats it over midwicket with a powerful thump
he tries to drag it from outside off again, but the length is fuller now. It slips under his bat
length delivery angled on to the pads, Thirimanne allows it to come in and whips it to deep square leg
this one is in KJP's hitting zone! Full and on the middle stump line. He picks it up with a wristy flick and smashes it to deep midwicket, but there is protection in the deep
he corrects the line now, bowls just outside off and the batsman defends it mid-on

that's the middle stump gone! Thirimanne goes forward to play a loose drive, it wasn't the right line for it. He leaves a big gap between the bat and pad. Shapoor bowled it full and this one came in a touch too, but that was a loose shot from the batsman. Excellent bowling from Shapoor.
fuller delivery outside off, Sanga pushes it to mid-on
he gets off the mark with a dab to cover. Sanga is quick between the stumps too
oh Sanga is on some other level! Just walks across a bit and whips the length ball through midwicket with utter ease! What a shot!
this one is bowled across the stumps and he lets it go through
gets squared up a touch as he plays this off the back foot, but manages to get a single down to third man
it's pushed to mid-on with soft hands and the batsman scamper through for a single
waits on the back foot and defends it to square leg
oh there is too much angle on this one, this slips down the leg side and the keeper does well to prevent it from running down to the fine leg boundary

oh what a screamer! A sharp sharp bouncer catches KJP in a complete tangle and lobs to the keeper. Afghanistan think they have a wicket, but the umpire doesn't think so. That hit something on the way. It hits the arm definitely - KJP is getting some attention from the physio.. Good decision, there is no glove on that.. It has hit the arm
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
another sharp delivery, the batsman waits on the back foot and defends it to midwicket
the inside edge saves the batsman here! He played back to  a length delivery and tried to whip it to the leg side.. That was probably going down leg again
length delivery on off stump, the batsman stays back and punches it to the bowler
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman stays back again and pushes it to mid on
he takes a lovely forward stride and drives the length delivery to extra cover
back of length and on the pads, Sanga was shuffling across already and punches it to the leg side, but that's hit straight to midwicket
back of length delivery, slides across the batsman and Sanga lets it go through
gets behind the line of the ball and punches it to cover
slightly slower this time from the bowler, Sanga comes forward and pushes it to mid on
oh he dabs this one softly towards cover and takes off for a single immediately. He does this so well.
shuffles across and gets on top of the back of length delivery, defends it down the pitch
length delivery, he comes forward and pushes it to extra cover for another quick single

oh he has been kept quiet today, but now he goes for a cross-batted mow! It was back of length outside off, but he whipped it through backward square leg. Not the most convincing shot, but gets him four
oh that is some power from KJP now! This was a full slower delivery and  KJP loves this pick up shot! Whacked over the deep midwicket fielder. He always knew it was going to clear that fielder
that one jags back in from outside off! KJP was playing off the back foot and doesn't cover the line, gets hit on the pads, but that was slipping down the leg side
dabs it to the off side for yet another quick single
back of length delivery, swings in a touch too. Kusal Perera defends it back to the bowler
there is some timing behind this one as he punches it to cover, but hit straight to the fielder
oh this is through the fielder! Again, KJP blasts this through cover and hits it really really hard. In the end, Nawroz Mangal had no time to react to this head-high effort..
he pushes this one to the off side for another quick single
he is the master of manoeuvring the ball! Shuffles across the stumps and nudges it behind square for an easy single
length delivery on off stump, KJP is opening up now, swings his bat and hits it over the bowler's head for yet another boundary
starts off with a slow leg cutter on off stump, Sanga pushes this to mid-on off the front foot
looks to push it through cover, but gets an inside edge to midwicket. Ashraf is not giving any pace here
he shuffles across and looks to thread the gap at midwicket, but finds the fielder
no pace from the bowler here! Sanga has to wait before defending it back to the bowler
comes forward and pushes the back of length delivery to midwicket
very smart bowling this! No pace behind it and he is keeping it tight on the stumps. Sanga can only defend it back
he steps out of the crease to defend the full delivery to the off side
looks to push this one though off without getting close to the line, gets an inside edge on to the pads
looks to come down the pitch again, but defends it to the off
quicker delivery from Nabi, KJP waits and defends it to the off
some width this time and KJP shapes to play the cut, but is beaten by the extra bounce
some turn and more bounce! This one comes in with the angle from round the wicket, then grips the surface to turn past the outside edge. Another maiden
length delivery, Sanga waits and then punches it to deep cover for a single
another single to deep cover as KJP punches this length delivery off the front foot
he has had enough of dabbing around! Sanga charges down the pitch, but still fails to connect properly.. Gets an under edge to mid-on and picks up a quick single
fuller length delivery, KJP is not quick to come into the front foot, pushes it to mid off
he keeps it tight on the off stump line, the batsman punches it to extra cover
slightly misses the line by bowling this on the pads, KJP clips it easily to deep square leg for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, KJP dabs it to cover point, but Sanga charges down for a single. Returns in time
this one is fired straight on and hits the pad, but it was slipping down the leg side
oh wonderful bowling! This one spins away now and beats the batsman completely
he goes back to punch this to the off side, but pushes it in the air to deep cover to bring up the team's fifty
he manages to beat Sanga too! Wonderful bowling this. It is flatter, angled in from round the stumps, then spins past the outside edge
and again! This one is quicker and turns past the bat. It's not everyday that you beat a player like Sanga twice in a row

that's chopped on! KJP's laboured stay comes to an end! He has played some good shots, but has struggled for timing today. He tries to punch this length delivery on the up through covers, but the lack of pace means he is early in the shot. The ball takes an inside edge and clatters on to the stumps.. This is going to be a tricky pitch.. It's slow, very slow and Afghanistan are bowling very well
length delivery outside off, Mahela plays it late, steers it down to third man for a single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
he is bowling the perfect pace for this wicket! Sanga has to wait before pushing this through cover for a single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it to point
he lunges forward to push the fuller delivery to cover
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to the bowler
flatter and quicker, Sanga plays for the turn which is not there, gets an inside edge on to the pads
he plays this very late, carefully watches the turn, then defends it down the pitch
this time he goes deep into the crease and since the length is short, it gives him time to whip it to deep midwicket
tossed up delivery, Mahela walks across and flicks it to fine leg for a single
fuller delivery, the batsman punches it back down to the bowler

oh how sweetly is that timed! It's a leg cutter outside off and Mahela just comes forward and pushes it perfectly in the gap at cover point.. The fielder gives it a good chase, puts in a dive, but seems to have touched the rope.. Yes he has.
he plays this full delivery really late to get the timing, punches it to mid off
goes on the back foot to the back of length delivery, opens the face of the bat late to steer it to third man
misses his length this time and pays for it! It's a low full toss and that's easy pickings for Sanga, who flicks it in the gap at backward square leg nonchalantly
allows the ball to come in, then defends it to cover point
comes forward this time and punches the length delivery to mid off
walks across the stumps and nudges the ball with the turn to square leg for a single
tossed up delivery, Sanga comes forward and eases it to long off
again, walks across to the off side and tickles the ball fine on the leg side
fires it full on the pads, Sanga misses out as he ends up pushing it down the pitch
he takes a good  forward stride to reach the pitch of the delivery, then defends it
goes on the back foot and punches the length delivery down to long on
the inside edge saves Sanga here! He was stuck in the crease to this full delivery and the ball moved a touch in the air too
that's punched nicely off the front foot to cover, where the fielder allows it to go through him. The captain cannot shout at anyone because it's himself..
length delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
there can't be better defensive pushes than Sanga's! It's hit to cover, but everything about it is so perfect
this time he comes forward and drives the length delivery through the on side, it's hit to deep midwicket
walks down the pitch and dabs the length delivery to the left of the midwicket fielder
oh this turns a lot! It pitched outside off and turned down the leg side
he watches the turn carefully before clipping it to the deep square leg area for a single
oi! Give him a brush and he would make a great painter! There is only a tiny gap at point and Mahela plays it so late, picks up the gap perfectly
full and flighted, the batsman blocks it out to the off
looks to come down the pitch, but then nudges the full delivery to midwicket for a single
he comes forward and defends the turning ball back to the bowler
this time he jumps out of the crease and drives the full delivery past the bowler, there is no protection in the deep
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to mid-off with ease

oh that's a big wicket! Mahela plays a loose loose shot here! He was looking to chip it over the bowler's head but only gets a toe-end to it to lob it tamely towards mid-on where the fielder moves a little to his left and takes a simple overhead catch. It was not a full delivery, and came slow of the pitch. What a strike this is! Mirwais has been bowling brilliantly and gets some reward. That wicket was more than 11000 ODI runs
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to cover
again, he comes forward and defends the length delivery to the off
stays in the crease and steers it to third man for a single
back of length delivery, Sanga allows the ball to come in before clipping it behind square on the leg side for a single
flatter and shorter, Sanga goes deep in the crease and punches it to long on
tossed up delivery on off, Chandimal pushes it aerially towards cover point for a single
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to cover
comes down the pitch, but the bowler slows his pace down. In the end, Sanga has to defend it back down the bowler
looks to cut this, but gets a top edge that falls well short of the fielder at short third man
goes on the back foot and punches it to deep midwicket
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
he looks to push this through covers, but the slowness of the pitch means he plays too early, gets an inside edge on to his pads
there is a direct hit from mid-off, but Sanga was well in
the length is much shorter this time, allows Chandimal to get behind it and clip it to deep square leg
oi! How did this miss the off stump! It surprises everyone as it almost scoots along the floor. Sanga was playing a drive and it went under his bat
another direct hit from mid-off, and again, Sanga has made it well in time
he waits on the back foot, then pushes the turning delivery in the gap at midwicket for a single
tossed up on off, the batsman comes forward and eases it to long off for a single
floated up to the batsman, Sanga comes forward and drives it down to long on
he comes down the pitch and flicks it to long on for a single
this run was much tighter! If there was a direct hit this time, Sanga would have gone! He flicked it to short fine leg and was a little slow to respond to Chandimal's call
beautifully punched to mid-off off the front foot. Nabi, hits the stumps third time in a row. Again, the batsmen are in comfortably and they take an extra off the ricochet
he comes forward and pushes it to mid-off, to Nabi again, and takes another single. This time Nabi holds the ball back
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
slightly full and Chandimal is quick to come forward and drive it to deep cover. Just a single through. That shot brought up the team's 100 too
he comes forward and punches the length delivery to cover
tosses it up, but it ends up being a low full toss that is easily flicked to deep midwicket
flatter trajectory this time and he gets some turn too, but Sanga goes deep in his crease and whips it to deep square leg for a quick couple
full delivery on the pads, he flicks it straight to short fine leg
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it to cover
he comes down the pitch and almost yorks himself! Digs it out down the pitch
full and flighted on off, the batsman pushes it down to long off for a single
tossed up and on the pads, the batsman flicks it to short fine leg
looks for the big shot! He wanted to send this over cow corner, but the ball spins in sharply and takes the inside edge! He is feeling the pressure here, Chandimal. That was a huge huge heave
this one goes straight on, the batsman pushes it down the pitch
he comes down the pitch, and calmly pushes it to mid on
flighted delivery outside off, Sanga comes forward and pushes it to cover
comes out of the crease and takes this one on the full, but fails to beat the man at cover
allows the ball to turn, then punches it to the off side, but hit straight to cover
he skips out of the crease and drives it with the spin down to long off
Sanga too uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball, pushes it to long on easily
more use of the feet, Chandimal drives it straight to long off
oh that is a poor poor delivery! Way down the leg side, but you can only get one extra for that
tossed up delivery, the batsman comes down the pitch and pushes it to long on
flatter delivery, Sanga stays calm and punches it to long off. He is only three short of yet another fifty..
full and on the middle stump line, the batsman whips it to midwicket
comes down the pitch and punches the quicker delivery to long on
tossed up on off, the batsman drives it down to long on
this time he charges down the pitch, gets to the pitch of the ball and heaves it on the off side with the turn! It clears deep midwicket..
he used his feet and drives it comfortably to long on
he also uses his feet like his partner, drives it to long off
and yet another half-century! The machine keeps rolling. Neatly clipped to deep midwicket
pushed to deep cover for a single
flighted outside off, Sanga takes it on the full and drives it to long off
he stays on the back foot and whips it to deep midwicket
plays it with the turn to deep square leg
waits for the ball to turn, then punches it to cover
wow! It's the first big shot from Sanga! This was tossed up wide outside off and Sanga goes against the turn to whack it over deep midwicket. That has gone deep into the stands
attempts the repeat of the shot, but the ball is not full enough, it slides under the bat this time.
flatter delivery, the batsman pushes it to cover
full delivery outside off, Sanga squeezes it out to cover point
tossed up outside off, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
this one is short and wide outside off, Chandimal punches it to deep cover for a single
comes down the pitch, but the bowler shortens the length. Sanga ends up pushing it back down the pitch
there is some urgency in Sanga's footwork now as he skips down the pitch to punch it to midwicket
short, turning down the leg side, Sanga has all the time in the world to pull it in the gap at fine leg
down the pitch to a short ball again, he flicks it towards deep midwicket but is not in control as this lobs up in the air. Luckily for him, it drops short of the fielder
length delivery, Sanga punches it to mid-off on the up
he has dropped it! Sanga punched it back to the bowler! He played too early and Dawlat couldn't grab on to an easy chest high chance! What a clanger
he defends the next delivery off the front foot to midwicket
tries to whack the fuller delivery to the on side, but doesn't get hold of it, pushes it to mid on
comes forward and drives the length ball on the up to long off
he goes on the back foot and guides the back of length delivery to third man for a single
flatter and shorter outside off, Chandimal punches it to deep cover to give the strike to Sanga
comes down the pitch to a tossed up delivery, then drives it down to long off

oh he finds the gap at cover point beautifully! Sometimes he comes down the pitch, sometimes he goes deep! This time he chooses the second option, waits for the ball to come to him, then slashes it hard through the gap
goes on the back foot and pushes it to long on
he comes forward and pushes this to long on. And that's drinks
stays on the back foot and clips the back of length delivery to deep midwicket
wide length delivery outside off, Sanga stretches out and still manages to find the gap at point..
looks to punch it through off, put gets an inside edge to the keeper, who is not able to make a clean stop
plays across the line to the length delivery and gets hit on the thigh pad
a misfield by midwicket allows a single! The fielder doesn't bend down in time
stays on the back foot and dabs the length delivery to point for a quick single
oh this one is tossed up outside off and Sanga plays for the turn, but it slides across the beat the bat
fuller delivery, the batsman punches it to mid off

another chance missed! It was difficult, but the keeper had to hit the stumps here! Sanga went down the pitch, but the ball turned into him, clipped his pad and rolled to the right of the keeper. He reacted soon enough, but didn't hit the stumps. Sanga was way down the crease and would have been out
he comes forward and defends it to the bowler

he throws it away, Chandimal! Tries to go inside out over extra cover, but the tossed up delivery lands on middle stump line, spins past the outside edge and takes the off stump out! Beautifully bowled by Hotak. That dipped and spun.
he comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
that is thumped off the front foot towards cover, but Nabi dives and prevents a certain boundary

Sanga is gone now! His luck runs out and finally Afghanistan strike! Dawlat produced a wonderful yorker that Angelo just about dug out towards square leg. He was off balance, so was not going to look for a run, but Sanga wanted to get to the other end and charged down manically. By the time he realised there was no run, it was too late as an accurate throw was fired to the bowler. Dawlat takes the stumps out. Infact, Angelo looked for a run initially and said NO after a delay
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it to long on
length delivery on the stumps, de Silva pushes it down the pitch
another run out opportunity! de Silva dabs the ball to the bowler's left and charges down the pitch, the bowler picks it up and fires at the stumps, but misses. The batsman was nowhere in sight
length ball, but this one is down the leg side
full delivery on off, the batsman goes down on his knee and drives it handsomely, but straight to cover
flatter delivery on the stumps, Angelo pushes it to long on for a single
full on the middle stump, the batsman punches it to long on
slower this time, the batsman waits and then defends
comes down the pitch, takes the flighted delivery on the full and drives it down to long on
flatter and turns in sharply, the batsman gets an inside edge to midwicket
drives it down to long on for a single
bowls a quick short of length delivery outside off, de Silva looks to punch it to off, but is beaten by the pace there
another one beats the outside edge! this one keeps going away with the angle
this time he manages to get some bat on it, but it's an outside edge and that runs down to the third man boundary
back of length delivery outside off, this time he rides the bounce and punches it to deep cover

length delivery on the stumps, Angelo flicks it to deep square leg, he completes the first and calls for a second belatedly..The throw comes in and is a touch wide, which saves Angelo.. An accurate throw would have sent him back. The third umpire is checking, but Angelo is fine
bowls a sharp bouncer outside off, the batsman sways out of the line. That Powerplay has gone in favour of Afghanistan big time - 23/2

allows the ball to turn, and pushes it to deep midwicket for a couple. But hello hello, another wayward throw to the non-striker's end gives the batsman six runs. There was no one backing up.. Poor work
he comes down the pitch and pushes it to long on for a single
tossed up delivery on the middle stump line, Angelo pushes it to long on for a single
flatter and quicker outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it down to long off
he goes back and punches this one for another single to long off
tossed up outside off, but the batsman drives it to long on with a wristy flick
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it to wide mid on for a single
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
length delivery on the stumps, it's bowled at a good pace and the batsman pushes it in the air towards midwicket
goes on the back foot and flicks it fine for a single

another wicket! another soft dismissal! Sri Lanka are falling apart. De Silva flicks this short of length delivery straight to midwicket. He perhaps wanted to go squarer, but the extra pace from Dawlat meant he wasn't able to get it to the desired direction...
length delivery on off side, he stays in the crease and defends it to off
fuller delivery on off stump, Angelo flicks it behind square on the leg side for a single
excellent take down the leg side by the keeper, but that was off the pads
another one down the leg side, there is nothing on it this time and it's called a wide
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg
another one on the pads and it's flicked too easily to fine leg
bowls it straight and fast, doesn't give any room to Angelo, who pushes it back to the bowler
he dabs it towards mid on for a quick single to keep the strike
tossed up delivery, tucked behind square with the turn
bowls it flatter to Thisara, who flicks it to midwicket for a single
flatter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
tossed up and on the pads, Angelo tucks it to short fine leg for a quick single
quicker delivery and Thisara gets a leading edge towards cover, he is lucky that there is no one there..
oh that one was quick! He fires in a yorker and Angelo digs it out to mid on for a single
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back down the pitch
fuller delivery on the pads and the batsman misses out, gets hit on the pads
back of length delivery, it's punched to the left of mid-off. The batsmen think about a single, but then decide against it as they see the fielder charging
on the pads again, this time Thisara flicks it fine for a single
bowls a slower delivery from round the wicket, the batsman dabs it to midwicket for a single
short of length delivery on the leg stump line, easily clipped to fine leg for a single
quicker delivery on the pads, Thisara flicks it to deep midwicket for a single
flatter and quicker, turns in to cramp the batsman of room, the batsman pushes it to cover
goes on the back foot and pushes this one softly towards long on to come back for the second
allows the ball to turn in, then flicks it to deep square leg for a single
flatter again, he is not tossing it up for Thisara at all, the batsman whips it off the back foot to deep square leg
again, no flight on this ball, the batsman punches it to midwicket
that's a good yorker from Shapoor! Quick and on the toes..the batsman has no time to get his bat down, he gets struck on the pads, but that was slipping down
another yorker attempted, but this ends up being a low full toss and it's flicked to fine leg for a single
here comes the big shot! Angelo gets the length ball and slaps it over midwicket with a full swing.. That was coming in with the angle from round the wicket, so a safe shot
stays on the back foot and dabs the length delivery to the left of cover for a single
a good yorker again! Thisara was looking to make room and the bowler chased him with that, it's pushed to deep midwicket for a single
charges down the pitch, but Shapoor bowls this one short. Angelo has to adjust late and he picks up a single to cover
back of length delivery, the batsman slices it to point for a single
oh what a good yorker again! This one is wide outside off and the batsman can't connect at all
this is a yorker gone wrong, it ends up being a high full toss outside off. Thisara swings his bat, but gets a toe end to wide long on.. That was a tight call, looked alright in the replays
he manages to pick up a boundary finally! It was short of length and on the leg stump line, the batsman hops to get inside the line and flick it fine
another good yorker this time! All Angelo can do is dig it out towards mid on. They pick up a single
a misfield at extra cover allows a couple! It was wide full toss and the batsman lashed it towards cover. It was in the air for a bit, but drops just short of the fielder..
fuller outside off, the batsman slices it behind point for a couple
oh Shapoor, the big man, has taken a hit! He had no time to get out of the way of the Angelo shot! It was a low full toss, that was hit back firmly and hit him on his left knee..The physio is out...

oh what a yorker again! It beats everyone - the batsman, the stumps, the keeper. To be fair to the keeper, he was going the right way, but that hit the batsman's pad and changed direction.. What a good ball that was, but that has given Sri Lanka some vital extra runs

wow, keeps bowling those toe crushers! Thisara manages to dig it out towards deep square leg and turns for a second belatedly.. Excellent throw from the deep too, and it just misses the stumps.. Thisara was nowhere in sight
attempts another yorker, but this one is too far down the leg side
oh terrific stuff from the bowler. There is no room to swing the bat. Thisara still can't any bat on this one.. wondeful yorker, hits the pads and rolls to short third man
lucky boundary for Angelo! He was looking to swing this length ball over midwicket, but gets a thick outside edge over point...
full and fast on the stumps, Mathews punches it in the air towards mid-on and calls for a quick single
Excellent slower delivery! Bamboozles the batsman. He is made to wait, then pushes it back to the bowler
it's time to swing now and swing he does, picks up the length delivery from middle stump, swings across the line to get it over midwicket and there is no one out there to stop that
oh that is a beamer!  it slipped off his hand, the batsman falls away to avoid that and the keeper had no chance too..It's his second beamer, he is being taken off the attack..
fuller delivery, that is blasted to long off and they come back for a second as Nabi fails to take that throw from the fielder
swings across the line, but only manages to get it as far as long on
fuller and wider, Thisara doesn't manage to get under it, slaps it along the ground to long on
full and straight, the batsman hits it down the ground and comes back for a second. Nabi fails to collect the throw - it was a yorker of a throw - and Thisara is able to come back

inn2.comm: what a ball first up! It pitches on middle then swings away, completely opens up the batsman, he gets a leading edge that lands safely between point and cover
he is not going to poke and waste time! Charges down the pitch and tries to send it to Dhaka city centre, but only gets a toe-end to it that rolls to point
this one is quick, but down the leg side
he attempts the yorker, but it's a low full toss that is pushed to wide mid on for team's first runs off the bat
oh what a ball! Fuller length delivery that shapes away late. The batsman was rooted in the crease and is completely beaten by that..
again, he stays in the crease to Malinga's outswingers but manages to get behind the line this time
he is not ready to come forward to Malinga, gets another outswinger and plays it to backward point off the outside half of the bat..He is not comfortable against Malinga at all
length delivery outside off, he doesn't get the swing Malinga was getting, the batsman leaves it alone
oh what a shot! This has gone way over extra cover, into the stands... He charges down the pitch, makes room along the way and gets under the length ball to send this to the stands..
back of length delivery, swings away too, this time it is left alone

the off stump takes a beating! Too rash from Shahzad, some would say. He gets the front leg out of the way, wanted to smash it over mid-on, gives himself too much room and plays an ungainly cross-batted swat.. Unfortunately for him, he makes no connection and the ball hits the top of off..Quick exit for Shahzad
stays back to the back of length delivery and gets an inside edge to fine leg for a single
good delivery by Lakmal! This one is on a length and it swings away.. The batsman is beaten as he is rooted to the crease
beats the batsman again with an outswinger. Stanikzai has a poke, but makes no connection
he is staying back to Malinga, covering the stumps. This one is length delivery on off and he gets behind it to defend it
short delivery this time, Stanikzai is a touch late in his pull shot, plays it unconvincingly to square leg
it was an attempted yorker, but it was going down the leg side and the batsman manages to get a faint tickle on that
bowls another full delivery, this one is outside off, Stanikzai slices it to cover point
this time he lets it go as it's slightly wide outside off
oh another wonderful delivery by Lakmal! It comes in with the angle, then darts away after pitching, leaving the batsman embarassed
length delivery on off, the batsman stays on the back foot as he defends it to mid on
no swing this time, the batsman goes on the back foot to defend the back of length delivery to cover
stays in the crease and defends the length delivery towards point
this one comes in to the batsman, who whips it to the leg side, but cannot get it past Thisara at square leg
this one stays low and beats the bat again, the batsman was again playing it off the back foot
he is continuously beating the bat with these away-swinging deliveries..The batsman has a poke, but makes no connection
fires it on the off stump line, gets some shape on it as well, the batsman defends it to off
fuller delivery on the middle stump line, it's not quite a yorker, so the batsman is able to drive it through midwicket
punches this fuller delivery down the ground, but is not able to beat the fielder at mid on
he changes his line, bowls it on short of length and wide outside off, the batsman chases it but gets beaten
oh what a cracking shot! That sound echoed everywhere. It was a perfectly fine delivery outside off, but the batsman plays a mighty good square drive through point.. No one moved
takes a step down the pitch and defends the length delivery to off
he targets the off stump this time, but the batsman manages to punch it to mid on
a misfield at mid-on by Mahela allows an extra run! That was dabbed towards the fielder, who charged in, but ran over the ball
he hops on the crease and glances the length delivery to fine leg stylishly to pick up a single
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover
he starts off with a length delivery on off stump that is punched to mid off easily
gets that to dart in sharply and managed to hit the pads, everyone asks the question off the umpire, but that was doing too much
stays in the crease and punches the length delivery to cover
oh lovely timing by Noor Ali! It was fuller delivery on the pads and he punches it beautifully through midwicket, no follow through of the bat, just a mere punch
stays in the crease and defends this back to the bowler
fuller outside off, he pushes at it away from the body, hits it straight to mid off
oh another super shot through midwicket! this time it is Stanikzai. He allows the ball to come in with the angle and makes a beautiful connection with the shot.. It races to the boundary
stays in the crease and defends the length ball to the off side
back of length delivery on off, the batsman gets behind the line and defends
oh another good shot, this time through point! It was back of length, rising, the batsman hops up to get on top of the bounce, then just steers it through point..
he comes forward and defends this to cover
keeps it tight on off stump, the batsman pushes it straight to mid on
he comes solidly behind the length ball to defend it to mid off
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
another tight delivery just outside off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
he walks down the pitch and Thisara responds with a quick short delivery. The batsman looks to pull it, but was hurried by the pace on that.
nicely done! He flicks the back of length ball from outside off to fine leg, in the West Indian style, the front leg in the air as he plays the shot
he comes behind the line of the ball and pushes it to cover
flatter delivery, turns away a touch, the batsman punches it to long off for a single
leans into the tossed up delivery and drives it straight to cover
flatter this time, he goes deep into the crease and punches it to long off
pushes it in the air to the left of the bowler! That turned and stopped on the pitch a bit and the batsman was not able to control the shot
pushed to long off easily this time, off the back foot for a single
fuller delivery this time, the batsman digs it out towards cover
quicker delivery outside off, Stanikzai gets up on his toes to defend it to cover
sharp delivery outside off, but Stanikzai rides the bounce beautifully and punches it through cover point for yet another boundary
comes forward and pushes the length delivery back down the pitch
he looks to work it away on the leg side, but gets an inside edge on to his thigh pad
he is lucky here as he gets a thick outside edge, but there is no one at first slip. It was removed just two balls ago.
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to off
he bowls the slider and the batsman didn't read that well, gets an inside edge to the leg side
fuller delivery on off, the batsman stretches forward and pushes it through point
presses forward and defends the full delivery down the pitch
goes on the back foot as the length is shorter and punches it to deep cover for a single
he dabs it to the midwicket area and calls for a single
comes forward and flicks the flatter delivery to backward square leg
length delivery, but this one is down the leg side and the batsman helps it on its way to fine leg
he hits the pads and goes up on an appeal, but there was a big inside edge on that

bowled him! Stanikzai was playing well, but he has been sent back now. Thisara can ramp up pace at times and he does it here too, bowls a fuller length after delivering quite a few shorter deliveries. The batsman remained rooted to the crease and plays outside the line. The offstump takes a beating
another good delivery from Thisara, fuller and aimed at middle and leg. The batsman brings the bat down in time to defend it
stays on the back foot and defends it to mid on
defends the length delivery towards cover point and calls for a quick single
starts off with a wide delivery that was short too, the batsman fails to make a connection as he goes for a cut
straighter delivery now, stays a touch low too, but defended well
another straighter delivery, the batsman stays in the crease and defends
he takes a forward stride and punches it down to long on
tossed up delivery this time, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long on
he survived the offspinner here! That turned in and the batsman didn't expect it to, he is lucky to get an inside edge
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to mid on off the front foot
he shuffles across the stumps and works away the length delivery to deep midwicket
gets on top of the bounce and guides this one down to third man for a single
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it to point off the back foot
he presses forward and punches the length delivery back to the bowler
he flicks it off his hips to fine leg for a single

caught at point! Noor Ali's vigil ends as he drives the tossed up delivery, but he didn't account for the turn. This one went away after pitching, caught a thick outside edge and was taken easily at point..
he comes forward to defend the full delivery, but gets an inside edge to midwicket
flatter delivery on the middle stump, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he presses forward and defends the length delivery back down the pitch
loopy delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket
quicker and spins away after pitching, it beats the outside edge as the batsman comes forward to defend
and another one! This one is a soft dismissal as Mangal gets a faint edge in trying to guide the length ball to third man. Afghanistan are in trouble here
welcomes the new batsman with a bouncer! Nabi, the captain, sways away from line
he stays on the back foot and punches the short of length delivery to cover
it's too straight this time and the batsman punches it through midwicket, Kusal Perera keeps it in with a wonderful dive near the boundary
he stays in the crease and pushes it to point off the back foot
he comes forward and punches the length delivery to mid off
the batsman pushes forward and gets an outside edge as the ball turns away. Luckily for him it drops short of the first slip fielder
now this one comes in after pitching, the batsman had no clue again. It takes an inside edge to midwicket
fuller delivery on the pads, it is flicked to deep square leg for a single
another one that goes away after pitching, the batsman defends it to off
fuller and straighter on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman plays it to square leg from the inside half of the bat
no movement for him this time, the batsman defends the length delivery easily
he stays solidly behind the line of the length ball and defends it to cover
short of length delivery on the middle, the batsman clips it to deep square leg for a single
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover
there is some width this time from Lakmal and the batsman slices it over point off the front foot. Malinga, from third man, slides to prevent the boundary
turns a length delivery to midwicket with a wristy flick for a single
fuller delivery, the batsman presses forward and defends
too full this time, it's pushed to point off the front foot
tossed up delivery, but the length is not too full, the batsman comes forward and defends
full and on the middle stump line, the batsman pushes it to Mendis
tossed up delivery on off, this one comes in after pitching, the batsman defends it to off
slides this one down the leg side, is called a wide
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman gets an outside edge towards point as he comes forward
he bowls a length delivery on the off stump line, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid on
Lakmal strikes! the batsman has a lazy waft at a length delivery outside off and he gets a thick outside edge that flies straight to the lone slip fielder. Thirimanne takes a good catch
a good first ball for the new batsman, it takes off from short of a length. The batsman sways away from line at the last moment
follows the short one with a fuller delivery angled across the left-hander, who is slow to come forward and gets beaten
length delivery on off, the batsman stays in the crease and defends it to point
fuller delivery, Najibullah doesn't come forward and pushes at it away from the body, gets beaten
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman defends it to cover
tossed up delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to midwicket this time
stretches forward and pushes the length ball to cover
fuller delivery, the batsman defends the length delivery towards the leg side
this one spins away, the batsman gets a leading edge to off as he had close the face of the bat
on the pads this time and it's glanced fine on the leg side for a couple of runs
harmless length delivery outside off, Najibullah refrains from playing
lovely line from Lakmal as he bangs this in on middle and off. Najibullah sways away
sweetly struck from Najibullah as he beats a packed cover field. Too much width on offer and he tapped it away off the back foot
good length ball with a bit of seam away after pitching, Najibullah pokes from the crease and misses
good length ball in the channel, pushed with an open face to point
slower ball on a good length and on off stump, he stays in line and blocks into the off side
jags away off a good length, too good for Nabi's tentative push outside off
this slower one is slid down the leg side and it dies on it's way to the keeper. Sanga is unable to collect it as he tumbles to his right. Touch lax from the veteran
swings this length ball outside off towards mid-on as his feet stay rooted to the crease
133kph, short ball, rising around chest high. Nabi enlists the aid of his full height and soft hands to keep it down
low full toss on middle and off, clipped rather smartly to deep midwicket
full delivery on leg stump, Najibullah picks it away to deep square leg
yorker tailing away on off stump, jabbed into the off side
flighted on middle and leg, nudged behind square
angled in and tossed up on the stumps, Nabi is forward and works it fine into the leg side
he's bowling nice and slow but the batsman is not being enticed. Defended on leg stump
quicker and flatter this time, Najibullah hurries his defensive
tossed up on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off, driven down the ground and the bowler takes care of it
he starts off with a slower delivery wide outside off and Nabi takes advantage with a rasping drive through cover point
fuller delivery this time, the attempted yorker, but this is down the leg side
he bowls it short and it is comfortably pulled to deep square leg for a single
he bowls a length delivery, but it is on the pads and is easily flicked behind square on the leg side
stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to mid on
tries to surprise the batsman with a short delivery, but it lacks zing, it is easily defended to off
goes for the yorker and it's down the leg side again, second wide of the over
bowls a fuller delivery on off, it's pushed to cover off the front foot
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
goes down on his knee early to play a premeditated paddle shot, sweeps it fine from outside off and picks up three
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it to long on
flatter and quicker, there is no room available, so the batsman punches it back to the bowler
allows the ball to come in before nudging it to short fine leg
comes down the pitch and punches it past the left of the bowler for a single to long off
starts off with a length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and punches it to deep extra cover
length delivery angled across the batsman, there is some extra zip on this and it beats the outside edge as the batsman looks to push it to off
he stays on the back foot and punches the length delivery to cover
goes full and wide this time, Najibullah's eyes light up and he goes for a drive, but he was a touch late to come forward and gets beaten
stays on the back foot and punches the length delivery to deep cover for a single
fuller delivery on the off, the batsman punches it to mid on
tossed up and slower on the pads, the batsman tucks it to short fine leg, but there is a fielder present
follows it up with a slider, the batsman plays inside the line and gets beaten
nicely flighted on the leg stump line, the batsman looks to drive, but the ball dips and turns into him, beating the inside edge
looks to sweep this fine, but doesn't get a touch on that, it hits the pads and rolls towards short fine leg
steps out of the crease, but realising he is not to the pitch of the delivery, just chips it to long on
fuller and quicker, the batsman gets hit on his boot outside the line of leg stump
he gets one to dart in to the batsman, who gets an inside edge on to his pads
a cracker of a shot! That was short and wide outside off, but Nabi comfortably pulls it through midwicket to send it scurrying to the boundary
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to off
a misfield at point allows a single, the batsman had chopped the length delivery with good timing towards him
this one just scoots along the surface, luckily for Najibullah, the line was outside off. He gets a bottom edge to the keeper
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover easily
tossed up delivery, the batsman flicks it behind square leg for a single
tries to sweep a ball from wide outside off to deep square leg but misses, gets hit on the pads, but that was outside the line of off

first aggressive shot from the captain as he charges down the pitch, gets under the ball and lifts it up towards the sight screen with ease. Wonderful strike. They need more of those to make it interesting
comes down again, but the bowlers shortens the length and the batsman is forced to defend
comes forward and defends the flatter delivery back down the pitch
short ball, and it's down the leg side too, it's swatted like a fly to deep backward square leg. I sense some movement here..
he comes forward and defends the length ball to point
back of length delivery, he gets behind the line and punches it to short cover

he drives again and drives it in the air, straight to the fielder at cover! The shot was on as it was a fuller delivery, but he didn't put anything behind that drive. Turned out to be a tame push and the fielder took it easily. The partnership is broken two short of fifty. Third wicket for Perera
puts in the effort in the first ball, this is outside off and flies at good clip, left alone by the batsman
slightly slower this time, the batsman leaves it alone as it is outside off. This one dies on its way to the keeper
he completes the maiden with a quicker delivery that bounces more than the batsman thought, he gets beaten by the pace on this
he takes a forward stride and defends the length ball to cover
flatter delivery on the stump, the batsman defends it to off

he raps the batsman on the pads, appeals persistently and the umpire gives away! It was flatter, quicker and it turned a touch too. Nabi was looking to sweep it and was hit in front of middle and leg. That pitched on leg and straightened Seven down now..
fligted delivery outside off, it dips and turns away to beat the defensive poke
this one keeps coming in with the arm, the batsman defends off the front foot
allows the ball to come in and tucks it to square leg for a single
extra bounce for Thisara again, the batsman comes forward to defend but gets hit high on the bat
bowls it in the channel outside off, the batsman allows it to go through
closer to the off stump this time, the batsman comes forward and defends it to point
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman drives, but he finds the cover fielder
teases the batsman with a fuller and wider delivery, but the batsman stays patient and leaves it alone
and he completes his spell with another tight delivery outside off. That's a maiden for Perera. Excellent figures for him
beautifully bowled by de Silva! Flighted, it dips, then turns away too, beats the batsman's drive
an arm ball to follow, the batsman gets an inside edge on to his pads this time
comes forward and defends it to midwicket
lunges forward and pushes this one to cover, another maiden for Sri Lanka
full and flighted, the batsman defends it down the pitch
quicker this time and headed for off stump, the batsman comes forward to defend
this one is loopy and turns in to the batsman, but he plays outside the line and gets hit on the pads. That was turning down the leg side though
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to mid off
a googly gets him a wicket! He was not reading the spin and pays with his wicket as he pushes outside the line. The ball spun in and hit the batsman on his back leg, right in front
lots of flight on this one, but the batsman is able to defend it easily
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman defends it to point
he opens the face of the bat to guide it to third man, but can't beat the slip fielder
fuller delivery, it's driven to wide long off, first in 21 balls
flatter outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
wider outside off, draws the batsman out, then turns to beat the outside edge
this one is much closer to the off stump, but beats the outside edge again
fuller delivery on off, the batsman drives it straight to cover
another googly, but this one is spinning down the leg side. It hits the pads and they runs a single
fuller and quicker, the batsman comes forward and defends
tossed up on off stump line, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman keeps defending

tossed up delivery outside off, this time the batsman thinks about driving and leaves a gap between the bat and pad, it's a googly again and it hit the middle and leg stump. Another one for Mendis. Sri Lanka are closing doors on Afghanistan quickly
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to point
flatter delivery this time, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
the innings has stalled completely, the batsman defends again

and everytime they have looked for a shot, they have given their wickets away! The batsman tries to drive it over cover, but gets a thick outside edge to short third man. Sri Lanka are through to the final of the Asia Cup again
